name: Silvernest, Inc.
description: Provider of an online roommate-matching platform designed for homeowners to rent out a room or portion of their home. The company's proprietary matching tool pairs boomers, retirees, empty nesters and other aging adults with compatible long-term housemates, enabling them to earn extra income, establish new social connections and the ability to stay in the home as the years go on.
one_liner: Provider of an online roommate-matching platform designed for homeowners to rent out a room or portion of their home. The company's proprietary matching tool pairs boomers, retirees, empty nesters and other aging adults with compatible long-term housemates, enabling them to earn extra income, establish new social connections and the ability to stay in the home as the years go on.
